activities: X.commerce, Inc. dba Magento, Inc. (“Magento”), an eBay company, offers ecommerce solutions for growing and large businesses. Our customer (merchants) and their customers’ personal information such as name, address, email and such might be transferred from Europe and stored on our servers in the U.S.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: First name, last name, address, email, card holder data
privacyprograms: The Magento product line of X.commerce, Inc. uses TRUSTe as its dispute resolution service provider.
recoursemech:
1. Privacy policy and terms of services are available to the public http://magento.com/legal/terms/privacy

2. Submit the complaint to privacy@ebayenterprise.com.  Privacy officer will review the complaint and work with the complainant to resolve the issue. 

3. In case the issue is not resolved complainant can submit a complaint to TRUSTe at https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request  

4. X.commerce, Inc. will cooperate with TRUSTe and the EU and Swiss data protection authorities to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.
